page.title: 10TYSON H BURRIDGE,SCHOOLS
page.content: {TYSON H BURRIDGE } On Tuesday June 18th 1985 we went to Tyson H Burridge.Mr Ivison answered our questions.We found he had 40 trailers,70 tractors,73 lorries and 44 drivers.The drivers go to Lands End and all over the country.Small lorries have 6 wheels large lorries have 10. The Tyson H Burridge buildings were formerly an old coach works. {FACTS AND FIGURES DISTINGTON SCHOOLS } QUESTIONS JUNIOR INFANTS No. of Children 150 106 Date School built 1876 1953 No. of Girls 65 47 No. of Boys 65 59 No. of classes 5 4 JUNIOR-Mrs Caine showed us round, she was very helpful to us. INFANTS-Mrs Cowen showed us round,she was also very helpful.
